job.title: Embedded Software Engineer
job.description: pResponsibilitiesppThe Embedded System Engineer is responsible for developing on or deploying different test environments and capabilities on the platforms They will develop and integrate tests They will also need to be able to design and execute experiments to triage issuesppMinimum QualificationspulliBachelors degree in Engineering Information Systems Computer Science or related fieldlili1 years Experience with Embedded Systemlili1 years Software Engineering or related work experiencelili1 years experience with Programming Language such as C C Java Python etcliliFamiliarity with debugging via JTAG interfaceliliHandson Knowledge of Linux installation configuration and usage distrosliliKnowledge of Data center Servers Storage solutions and PeripheralsliliAbility to use oscilloscopes and logic analyzersliliExperience with SOC architecture design  verification or validationliliStrong Familiarity with Androidliul
